trans-unit.source: Represents assembly binding information that can be added to an instance of <see cref="T:System.AppDomain" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示可以添加到 <see cref="T:System.AppDomain" /> 的实例的程序集绑定信息。

trans-unit.source: Changing the properties of an <xref:System.AppDomainSetup> instance does not affect any existing <xref:System.AppDomain>.
trans-unit.target: 更改的属性<xref:System.AppDomainSetup>实例不会影响任何现有<xref:System.AppDomain>。

trans-unit.source: It can affect only the creation of a new <xref:System.AppDomain>, when the <xref:System.AppDomain.CreateDomain%2A> method is called with the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup> instance as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 它可能会影响仅创建一个新<xref:System.AppDomain>，当<xref:System.AppDomain.CreateDomain%2A>方法调用与<xref:System.AppDomainSetup>作为参数的实例。

trans-unit.source: This class implements the <xref:System.IAppDomainSetup> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此类实现 <xref:System.IAppDomainSetup> 接口。

trans-unit.source: The default value for the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.DisallowCodeDownload%2A> property is false.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.DisallowCodeDownload%2A>属性为 false。

trans-unit.source: This setting is unsafe for services.
trans-unit.target: 此设置是不安全的服务。

trans-unit.source: To help prevent services from downloading partially trusted code, set this property to true
trans-unit.target: 为了帮助防止服务下载部分受信任的代码，请将此属性设置为 true

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.AppDomainSetup" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.AppDomainSetup" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.AppDomainSetup" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.AppDomainSetup" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The activation context to be used for an application domain.
trans-unit.target: 要用于应用程序域的激活上下文。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.AppDomainSetup" /> class with the specified activation context to use for manifest-based activation of an application domain.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的激活上下文（用于基于清单的应用程序域激活）初始化 <see cref="T:System.AppDomainSetup" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ActivationContext> object specified for `activationContext` is used to generate an <xref:System.Runtime.Hosting.ActivationArguments> object containing information required to activate a new application domain.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ActivationContext>对象指定的用于`activationContext`用于生成<xref:System.Runtime.Hosting.ActivationArguments>对象，其中包含激活新的应用程序域所需信息。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Runtime.Hosting.ActivationArguments> object can be accessed by using the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ActivationArguments%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 这<xref:System.Runtime.Hosting.ActivationArguments>对象可以通过使用访问<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ActivationArguments%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="activationContext" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="activationContext" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies information required for the manifest-based activation of a new application domain.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，指定以基于清单的方式激活新的应用程序域所需的信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.AppDomainSetup" /> class with the specified activation arguments required for manifest-based activation of an application domain.
trans-unit.target: 使用基于清单的应用程序域激活所需的指定激活参数初始化 <see cref="T:System.AppDomainSetup" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The object specified for `activationArguments` can be accessed by using the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ActivationArguments%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 为指定的对象`activationArguments`可以通过使用访问<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ActivationArguments%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="activationArguments" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="activationArguments" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets data about the activation of an application domain.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与应用程序域的激活有关的数据。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains data about the activation of an application domain.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，其中包含与应用程序域的激活有关的数据。

trans-unit.source: No exception is thrown if this property is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 在此属性设置为引发任何异常`null`。

trans-unit.source: The information provided by the <xref:System.Runtime.Hosting.ActivationArguments> object supports manifest-based activation.
trans-unit.target: 提供的信息<xref:System.Runtime.Hosting.ActivationArguments>对象支持基于清单的激活。

trans-unit.source: The property is set to an <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Hosting.ActivationArguments" /> object whose application identity does not match the application identity of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust" /> object returned by the <see cref="P:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationTrust" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 属性设置为 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Hosting.ActivationArguments" /> 对象，该对象的应用程序标识不匹配 <see cref="P:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationTrust" /> 属性返回的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust" /> 对象的应用程序标识。

trans-unit.source: No exception is thrown if the <see cref="P:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationTrust" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationTrust" /> 属性为 <see langword="null" />，则不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.AppDomainInitializer" /> delegate, which represents a callback method that is invoked when the application domain is initialized.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.AppDomainInitializer" /> 委托，该委托表示在初始化应用程序域时调用的回调方法。

trans-unit.source: A delegate that represents a callback method that is invoked when the application domain is initialized.
trans-unit.target: 一个委托，表示在初始化应用程序域时调用的回调方法。

trans-unit.source: To pass information to the callback method, assign an array of strings to the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.AppDomainInitializerArguments%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要将信息传递给回调方法，分配的字符串转换为数组<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.AppDomainInitializerArguments%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The array is passed to the callback method each time an <xref:System.AppDomain> is initialized.
trans-unit.target: 该数组传递给回调方法每次<xref:System.AppDomain>初始化。

trans-unit.source: The callback method is executed in the context of the newly created application domain.
trans-unit.target: 新创建的应用程序域的上下文中执行此回调方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a child application domain named `ChildDomain`, using an <xref:System.AppDomainSetup> object and evidence from the default application domain.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建名为的子应用程序域`ChildDomain`，使用<xref:System.AppDomainSetup>对象和从默认应用程序域的证据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.AppDomainInitializer%2A> property is set to the callback method `AppDomainInit`, which is invoked when the child domain is initialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.AppDomainInitializer%2A>属性设置为回调方法`AppDomainInit`，这初始化子域时调用。

trans-unit.source: The arguments for the callback method are placed in an array of strings, which is assigned to the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.AppDomainInitializerArguments%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 回调方法的参数都将置于一个字符串，该值将赋给数组<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.AppDomainInitializerArguments%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: When the child domain is created, the callback method simply prints the strings.
trans-unit.target: 创建子域时，回调方法只需将打印字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the arguments passed to the callback method represented by the <see cref="T:System.AppDomainInitializer" /> delegate.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置传给 <see cref="T:System.AppDomainInitializer" /> 委托所表示的回调方法的参数。

trans-unit.source: The callback method is invoked when the application domain is initialized.
trans-unit.target: 在初始化应用程序域时将调用该回调方法。

trans-unit.source: An array of strings that is passed to the callback method represented by the <see cref="T:System.AppDomainInitializer" /> delegate, when the callback method is invoked during <see cref="T:System.AppDomain" /> initialization.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串数组，当在 <see cref="T:System.AppDomainInitializer" /> 初始化过程中调用 <see cref="T:System.AppDomain" /> 委托所表示的回调方法时，该字符串数组将被传给该回调方法。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.AppDomainInitializer%2A> property to specify a callback method that is invoked during <xref:System.AppDomain> initialization.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.AppDomainInitializer%2A>属性指定一个期间调用的回调方法<xref:System.AppDomain>初始化。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.AppDomainInitializer%2A> property is not set, the array assigned to this property is not used.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.AppDomainInitializer%2A>未设置属性，则不使用分配给此属性的数组。

trans-unit.source: The callback method is executed in the context of the newly created application domain.
trans-unit.target: 新创建的应用程序域的上下文中执行此回调方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a child application domain named `ChildDomain`, using an <xref:System.AppDomainSetup> object and evidence from the default application domain.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建名为的子应用程序域`ChildDomain`，使用<xref:System.AppDomainSetup>对象和从默认应用程序域的证据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.AppDomainInitializer%2A> property is set to the callback method `AppDomainInit`, which is invoked when the child domain is initialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.AppDomainInitializer%2A>属性设置为回调方法`AppDomainInit`，这初始化子域时调用。

trans-unit.source: The arguments for the callback method are placed in an array of strings, which is assigned to the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.AppDomainInitializerArguments%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 回调方法的参数都将置于一个字符串，该值将赋给数组<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.AppDomainInitializerArguments%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: When the child domain is created, the callback method simply prints the strings.
trans-unit.target: 创建子域时，回调方法只需将打印字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the display name of the assembly that provides the type of the application domain manager for application domains created using this <see cref="T:System.AppDomainSetup" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置程序集的显示名称，该程序集为使用 <see cref="T:System.AppDomainSetup" /> 对象创建的应用程序域提供应用程序域管理器的类型。

trans-unit.source: The display name of the assembly that provides the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the application domain manager.
trans-unit.target: 程序集的显示名称，该程序集提供应用程序域管理器的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: To specify the type of the application domain manager, set both this property and the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.AppDomainManagerType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定应用程序域管理器的类型，设置此属性与<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.AppDomainManagerType%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If either of these properties is not set, the other is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置这些属性之一，另一个被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If no type is provided, the application domain manager is created from the same type as the parent application domain (that is, the application domain from which the <xref:System.AppDomain.CreateDomain%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is called).
trans-unit.target: 如果未不提供任何类型，从与父应用程序域相同的类型创建的应用程序域管理器 (即，从该应用程序域<xref:System.AppDomain.CreateDomain%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>调用方法)。

trans-unit.source: When the application domain is loaded, <xref:System.TypeLoadException> is thrown if the assembly does not exist, or if the assembly does not contain the type specified by the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.AppDomainManagerType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 当加载应用程序域时，<xref:System.TypeLoadException>如果程序集不存在，或者如果程序集不包含由指定的类型将引发<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.AppDomainManagerType%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.FileLoadException> is thrown if the assembly is found but the version information does not match.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileLoadException> 如果找到的程序集但不是匹配的版本信息将引发。

trans-unit.source: To set the application domain manager for the default application domain, use the [\<appDomainManagerAssembly>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagerassembly-element.md) and [\<appDomainManagerType>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagertype-element.md) elements in the [\<runtime>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/runtime-element.md) section of the application configuration file, or use the environment variables described in <xref:System.AppDomainManager>.
trans-unit.target:
若要设置默认应用程序域的应用程序域管理器，使用[ \](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagerassembly-element.md)和[ \

](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagertype-element.md)中的元素[\<运行时 >](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/runtime-element.md)一部分的应用程序配置文件或使用环境变量中所述。

trans-unit.source: This feature requires the application to have full trust.
trans-unit.target: 此功能需要应用程序具有完全信任。

trans-unit.source: (For example, an application running on the desktop has full trust.) If the application does not have full trust, a <xref:System.TypeLoadException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: （例如，在桌面上运行的应用程序具有完全信任。）如果应用程序不具有完全信任，<xref:System.TypeLoadException>引发。

trans-unit.source: The format of the assembly display name is given by the <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.FullName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 通过给定程序集显示名称的格式<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.FullName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the full name of the type that provides the application domain manager for application domains created using this <see cref="T:System.AppDomainSetup" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置类型的全名，该类型可为使用此 <see cref="T:System.AppDomainSetup" /> 对象创建的应用程序域提供应用程序域管理器。

trans-unit.source: The full name of the type, including the namespace.
trans-unit.target: 类型的全名，其中包括命名空间。

trans-unit.source: To specify the type of the application domain manager, set both this property and the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.AppDomainManagerAssembly%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定应用程序域管理器的类型，设置此属性与<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.AppDomainManagerAssembly%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If either of these properties is not set, the other is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置这些属性之一，另一个被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If no type is provided, the application domain manager is created from the same type as the parent application domain (that is, the application domain from which the <xref:System.AppDomain.CreateDomain%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is called).
trans-unit.target: 如果未不提供任何类型，从与父应用程序域相同的类型创建的应用程序域管理器 (即，从该应用程序域<xref:System.AppDomain.CreateDomain%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>调用方法)。

trans-unit.source: When the application domain is loaded, <xref:System.TypeLoadException> is thrown if the assembly specified by the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.AppDomainManagerAssembly%2A> property does not contain the type specified by this property.
trans-unit.target: 当加载应用程序域时，<xref:System.TypeLoadException>如果通过指定的程序集，将引发<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.AppDomainManagerAssembly%2A>属性不包含此属性指定的类型。

trans-unit.source: To set the application domain manager for the default application domain, use the [\<appDomainManagerAssembly>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagerassembly-element.md) and [\<appDomainManagerType>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagertype-element.md) elements in the [\<runtime>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/runtime-element.md) section of the application configuration file, or use the environment variables described in <xref:System.AppDomainManager>.
trans-unit.target:
若要设置默认应用程序域的应用程序域管理器，使用[ \](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagerassembly-element.md)和[ \

](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagertype-element.md)中的元素[\<运行时 >](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/runtime-element.md)一部分的应用程序配置文件或使用环境变量中所述。

trans-unit.source: This feature requires the application to have full trust.
trans-unit.target: 此功能需要应用程序具有完全信任。

trans-unit.source: (For example, an application running on the desktop has full trust.) If the application does not have full trust, a <xref:System.TypeLoadException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: （例如，在桌面上运行的应用程序具有完全信任。）如果应用程序不具有完全信任，<xref:System.TypeLoadException>引发。

trans-unit.source: The format of the full name of a type is given by the <xref:System.Type.FullName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 一种类型的完整名称的格式由<xref:System.Type.FullName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the directory containing the application.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含该应用程序的目录的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the application base directory.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序基目录的名称。

trans-unit.source: The application base directory is where the assembly manager begins probing for assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序基目录是程序集管理器开始探测程序集。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationBase%2A> property can influence which permissions are granted to an application domain.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationBase%2A>属性可以影响到应用程序域授予的权限。

trans-unit.source: For example, an application domain originating from the local computer normally receives full trust based on its location of origin.
trans-unit.target: 例如，应用程序域通常来自本地计算机接收基于源其位置的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: However, if the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationBase%2A> property of that <xref:System.AppDomain> is set to the full name of an intranet directory, the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationBase%2A> setting restricts the permissions granted to the application domain to a LocalIntranet grant even though the application domain actually originates from the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationBase%2A>属性，<xref:System.AppDomain>设置 intranet 目录的完整名称为<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationBase%2A>设置将限制授予给应用程序域到 LocalIntranet grant 即使应用程序域的权限实际来自本地计算机。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationBase%2A> property to set the location where the assembly loader begins probing for assemblies to load into a new application domain.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationBase%2A>属性来设置程序集加载程序开始探测程序集加载到新的应用程序域的位置。

trans-unit.source: You must ensure that the folder you specify exists.
trans-unit.target: 你必须确保你指定的文件夹存在。

trans-unit.source: for access to the path information.
trans-unit.target: 用于访问的路径信息。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the application.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置应用程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the application.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationName%2A> property when you create a new application domain.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationName%2A>时创建新的应用程序域的属性。

trans-unit.source: The example creates a new application domain, and then calls the <xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstanceAndUnwrap%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to load the example assembly into the new application domain and create an instance of the `Worker` class.
trans-unit.target: 该示例创建一个新的应用程序域，并随后调用<xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstanceAndUnwrap%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法示例程序集加载到新的应用程序域并创建的实例`Worker`类。

trans-unit.source: The `Worker` class inherits <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>, so the example can use the proxy returned by <xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstanceAndUnwrap%2A> to call the `TestLoad` method.
trans-unit.target: `Worker`类继承<xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>，因此该示例可以使用返回的代理<xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstanceAndUnwrap%2A>调用`TestLoad`方法。

trans-unit.source: The `TestLoad` method loads an assembly that you specify.
trans-unit.target: `TestLoad`方法加载指定程序集。

trans-unit.source: You must either specify a valid, fully qualified assembly name, or comment out the <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.Load%28System.String%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 你必须指定有效的、 完全限定的程序集名称，或注释掉<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.Load%28System.String%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: The `TestLoad` method lists the assemblies that are loaded into the new application domain, showing that your specified assembly and the example assembly are loaded.
trans-unit.target: `TestLoad`方法列出的程序集加载到新的应用程序域，并显示你指定的程序集和示例程序集将加载。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.LoaderOptimizationAttribute> attribute to tell the assembly loader how the application will share code across application domains.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:System.LoaderOptimizationAttribute>属性告知程序集加载程序如何应用程序将跨应用程序域共享代码。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object containing security and trust information.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个包含安全性和信任信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains security and trust information.
trans-unit.target: 包含安全和信任信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: This property is `null` when the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup> is created.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是`null`时<xref:System.AppDomainSetup>创建。

trans-unit.source: Once changed, it cannot be reset to a null reference.
trans-unit.target: 更改后，则无法重置为空引用。

trans-unit.source: The property is set to an <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust" /> object whose application identity does not match the application identity of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Hosting.ActivationArguments" /> object returned by the <see cref="P:System.AppDomainSetup.ActivationArguments" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 属性设置为 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust" /> 对象，该对象的应用程序标识不匹配 <see cref="P:System.AppDomainSetup.ActivationArguments" /> 属性返回的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Hosting.ActivationArguments" /> 对象的应用程序标识。

trans-unit.source: No exception is thrown if the <see cref="P:System.AppDomainSetup.ActivationArguments" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.AppDomainSetup.ActivationArguments" /> 属性为 <see langword="null" />，则不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The property is set to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 属性设置为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of an area specific to the application where files are shadow copied.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置特定于应用程序且从中对文件进行卷影复制的区域的名称。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified name of the directory path and file name where files are shadow copied.
trans-unit.target: 从中对文件进行卷影复制的目录路径和文件名的完全限定名。

trans-unit.source: In order for this property to have an effect, the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationName%2A> property must also be set.
trans-unit.target: 为了使此属性产生任何影响，<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationName%2A>还必须设置属性。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationName%2A> property is not set, the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.CachePath%2A> property is ignored and the shadow copy cache location defaults to the download cache.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationName%2A>未设置属性，<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.CachePath%2A>属性将被忽略，并且卷影副本缓存位置默认为下载缓存。

trans-unit.source: For more information on shadow copying, see [Shadow Copying Assemblies](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md).
trans-unit.target: 卷影复制的详细信息，请参阅[影像复制程序集](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md)。

trans-unit.source: for access to the path information.
trans-unit.target: 用于访问的路径信息。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the configuration file for an application domain.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置应用程序域的配置文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 配置文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The configuration file describes the search rules and configuration data for the application domain.
trans-unit.target: 配置文件描述的搜索规则和应用程序域的配置数据。

trans-unit.source: The host that creates the application domain is responsible for supplying this data because the meaningful values vary from situation to situation.
trans-unit.target: 创建应用程序域的主机负责提供此数据，因为有意义的值会变化情况。

trans-unit.source: For example, the configuration data for ASP.NET applications is stored for each application, site, and computer, while the configuration data for an executable is stored for each application, user, and computer.
trans-unit.target: 例如，ASP.NET 应用程序的配置数据存储为每个应用程序、 站点以及计算机，可执行文件的配置数据存储为每个应用程序、 用户和计算机时。

trans-unit.source: Only the host knows the specifics of the configuration data for a particular circumstance.
trans-unit.target: 仅主机知道特定情况的配置数据的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: for access to the path information.
trans-unit.target: 用于访问的路径信息。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the application base path and private binary path are probed when searching for assemblies to load.
trans-unit.target: 指定在搜索要加载的程序集时是否探测应用程序基路径和专用二进制路径。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if probing is not allowed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果不允许探测，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.DisallowApplicationBaseProbing%2A> property is `true`, the value of the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationBase%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.DisallowApplicationBaseProbing%2A>属性是`true`的值<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationBase%2A>忽略属性。

trans-unit.source: That is, no assemblies are probed for in the directories specified by the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationBase%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 通过指定的目录中的探测没有任何程序集，即<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationBase%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the values of the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.PrivateBinPath%2A> property and the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.PrivateBinPathProbe%2A> property are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 此外的值<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.PrivateBinPath%2A>属性和<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.PrivateBinPathProbe%2A>属性将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: No assemblies are probed for in the directories specified by the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.PrivateBinPath%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 任何程序集指定的目录中探测<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.PrivateBinPath%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.DisallowApplicationBaseProbing%2A> property provides an additional layer of control over the loading process.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.DisallowApplicationBaseProbing%2A>属性提供一层额外的控制加载过程。

trans-unit.source: In the normal assembly loading sequence, the application base is probed before the <xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyResolve?displayProperty=nameWithType> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 在正常的程序集加载序列，应用程序基探测之前<xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyResolve?displayProperty=nameWithType>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: However, some applications might need to load assemblies from an OLE compound file within a document, or from a unique known location that is neither in the global assembly cache nor in the directories specified by the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationBase%2A> and <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.PrivateBinPath%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 但是，某些应用程序可能需要从在文档中，OLE 复合文件中或从既不在全局程序集缓存中上也不由指定的目录中的唯一已知位置加载程序集<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationBase%2A>和<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.PrivateBinPath%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Such applications can use the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.DisallowApplicationBaseProbing%2A> property to avoid the delay caused by normal probing, and to avoid loading copies of the necessary assembly that might be located in the normal probing paths.
trans-unit.target: 此类应用程序可以使用<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.DisallowApplicationBaseProbing%2A>属性以避免导致正常探测的延迟和避免加载可能位于正常的探测路径的必需程序集的副本。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether an application domain allows assembly binding redirection.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示应用程序域是否允许程序集绑定重定向。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if redirection of assemblies is not allowed; <see langword="false" /> if it is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 如果不允许程序集的重定向，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果允许，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.DisallowBindingRedirects%2A> property is designed to be used by services and server applications where assembly binding redirection is not part of the application scenario.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.DisallowBindingRedirects%2A>属性设计为供服务和服务器应用程序程序集绑定重定向不是应用程序方案的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether HTTP download of assemblies is allowed for an application domain.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示应用程序域是否允许通过 HTTP 下载程序集。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if HTTP download of assemblies is not allowed; <see langword="false" /> if it is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 如果不允许通过 HTTP 下载程序集，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果允许则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.DisallowCodeDownload%2A> property is designed to be used by services and server applications where downloading code from an intranet or the Internet is not part of the application scenario.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.DisallowCodeDownload%2A>属性设计为供服务和服务器应用程序从 intranet 或 Internet 下载代码不是应用程序方案的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The default value for the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.DisallowCodeDownload%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.DisallowCodeDownload%2A>属性是`false`。

trans-unit.source: This setting is unsafe for services.
trans-unit.target: 此设置是不安全的服务。

trans-unit.source: To help prevent services from downloading partially trusted code, set this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 为了帮助防止服务下载部分受信任的代码，请将此属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the [<publisherPolicy>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/publisherpolicy-element.md) section of the configuration file is applied to an application domain.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否将配置文件的 [<publisherPolicy>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/publisherpolicy-element.md) 部分应用于应用程序域。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see langword="<publisherPolicy>" /> section of the configuration file for an application domain is ignored; <see langword="false" /> if the declared publisher policy is honored.
trans-unit.target: 如果忽略应用程序域配置文件的 <see langword="<publisherPolicy>" /> 部分，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果接受所声明的发行者策略，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.DisallowPublisherPolicy%2A> property specifically applies to a Web application that is loaded locally.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.DisallowPublisherPolicy%2A>属性仅适用于本地加载 Web 应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to help prevent a malicious attempt to execute an unsafe Web application in safe mode.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性以帮助防止恶意尝试在安全模式下执行不安全的 Web 应用程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about bypassing publisher policy, see the [Redirecting Assembly Versions](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/redirect-assembly-versions.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关跳过发布服务器策略的详细信息，请参阅[重定向程序集版本](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/redirect-assembly-versions.md)主题。

trans-unit.source: For more information about safe mode, see the "Examining the Configuration Files" section of the [How the Runtime Locates Assemblies](~/docs/framework/deployment/how-the-runtime-locates-assemblies.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关安全模式的详细信息，请参阅的"检查配置文件"部分[运行时如何定位程序集](~/docs/framework/deployment/how-the-runtime-locates-assemblies.md)主题。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the base directory where the directory for dynamically generated files is located.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置动态生成的文件所在的目录的基目录。

trans-unit.source: The directory where the <see cref="P:System.AppDomain.DynamicDirectory" /> is located.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.AppDomain.DynamicDirectory" /> 所在的目录。

trans-unit.source: The return value of this property is different from the value assigned.
trans-unit.target: 该属性的返回值不同于分配的值。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to set the base directory where the dynamic directory for the new application domain will be located.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于设置新的应用程序域的动态目录将位于的基目录。

trans-unit.source: When code in the new application domain loads an assembly, assembly resolution looks first in the normal probing paths.
trans-unit.target: 新的应用程序域中的代码加载程序集、 程序集解析时看起来正常的探测路径中的第一行。

trans-unit.source: If it does not find the assembly, it looks in the dynamic directory, which is returned by the <xref:System.AppDomain.DynamicDirectory%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到程序集，它会查找在动态目录中，即<xref:System.AppDomain.DynamicDirectory%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: Dynamic assemblies that will be loaded and executed by the new application domain can be placed there.
trans-unit.target: 将加载和执行由新的应用程序域的动态程序集可放置在此处。

trans-unit.source: When you assign a path to the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.DynamicBase%2A> property, an additional subdirectory is added; the name of this subdirectory is the hash code of the value assigned to the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 将分配到的路径时<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.DynamicBase%2A>属性，添加了其他子目录; 此子目录的名称是分配给的值的哈希代码<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationName%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Thus, the base directory subsequently returned by this property is always different from the value assigned.
trans-unit.target: 因此，随后返回此属性的基目录始终是分配的值不同的。

trans-unit.source: Assigning a value to this property does not create any directories.
trans-unit.target: 将一个值分配给此属性不会创建任何目录。

trans-unit.source: The directories must be created or verified by the code that uses them.
trans-unit.target: 必须创建或验证使用它们的代码的目录。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic directory is a subdirectory of <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.DynamicBase%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 该动态目录是的子目录<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.DynamicBase%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Its simple name is the value returned by the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationName%2A> property, so its format is *original path*\\*hash code*\\*application name*.
trans-unit.target: 其简单名称是返回的值<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationName%2A>属性，因此其格式是*原始路径*\\*哈希代码*\\*应用程序名称*.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.DynamicBase%2A> property to set the path an application domain probes when loading dynamic assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.DynamicBase%2A>属性来设置应用程序域的路径探测时加载的动态程序集。

trans-unit.source: The example creates an <xref:System.AppDomainSetup> object and sets its <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationName%2A> property to "Example" and its <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.DynamicBase%2A> property to "C:\DynamicAssemblyDir".
trans-unit.target: 该示例创建<xref:System.AppDomainSetup>对象并设置其<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationName%2A>属性设置为"示例"并将其<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.DynamicBase%2A>"C:\DynamicAssemblyDir"的属性。

trans-unit.source: The example then displays the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.DynamicBase%2A> property, to show that the hash code of the application name has been appended as a subdirectory of the path that was originally assigned.
trans-unit.target: 然后该示例显示<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.DynamicBase%2A>属性，以显示应用程序名称的哈希代码，已追加视为最初分配的路径的子目录。

trans-unit.source: The base directory in this example is intended to be outside the probing path for the example application.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中的基目录旨在将示例应用程序的探测路径之外。

trans-unit.source: Be sure to compile the example in a different location.
trans-unit.target: 请务必编译中的不同位置的示例。

trans-unit.source: Delete the base directory and all its subdirectories each time you run the example.
trans-unit.target: 每次运行该示例删除基目录和所有子目录。

trans-unit.source: The example creates a new application domain using the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup> object.
trans-unit.target: 该示例创建新的应用程序域使用<xref:System.AppDomainSetup>对象。

trans-unit.source: The example then creates the dynamic directory if it does not already exist.
trans-unit.target: 然后，示例创建的动态目录，如果不存在。

trans-unit.source: Although the example uses the application domain's <xref:System.AppDomain.DynamicDirectory%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to get the name of the dynamic directory, it could just as easily create the directory beforehand by concatenating the original path, the hash code of the application name, and the application name.
trans-unit.target: 虽然本示例使用应用程序域的<xref:System.AppDomain.DynamicDirectory%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性来获取其名称的动态目录中，它可以轻松地事先创建目录通过串联的原始路径，应用程序名称的哈希代码和应用程序名称。

trans-unit.source: The example has a `GenerateDynamicAssembly` method that emits an assembly named `DynamicHelloWorld.dll` and stores it in the new application domain's dynamic directory.
trans-unit.target: 本示例具有`GenerateDynamicAssembly`发出名为程序集的方法`DynamicHelloWorld.dll`并将其存储在新应用程序域的动态目录。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic assembly contains one type, `HelloWorld`, that has a static method (`Shared` method in Visual Basic) named `HelloFromAD`.
trans-unit.target: 动态程序集包含一个类型， `HelloWorld`，具有一个静态方法 (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中的方法) 名为`HelloFromAD`。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method displays the name of the application domain.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法显示应用程序域的名称。

trans-unit.source: The `Example` class derives from <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>, so the example can create an instance of the class in the new application domain and call its `Test` method.
trans-unit.target: `Example`类派生自<xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>，因此该示例可以创建类的实例中的新应用程序域和调用其`Test`方法。

trans-unit.source: The `Test` method loads the dynamic assembly by its display name and calls the static `HelloFromAD` method.
trans-unit.target: `Test`方法加载的动态程序集按其显示名称，并调用静态`HelloFromAD`方法。

trans-unit.source: You can show that the dynamic directory is searched after the normal probing paths by writing code for an assembly named `DynamicHelloWorld.dll` and compiling it in the same directory as this example.
trans-unit.target: 你可以显示在正常的探测路径后搜索的动态目录，通过对名为程序集编写代码`DynamicHelloWorld.dll`并将其编译此示例为同一个目录中。

trans-unit.source: The assembly must have a class named `HelloWorld` with a static method named `HelloFromAD`.
trans-unit.target: 程序集必须具有一个名为类`HelloWorld`与一个名为的静态方法`HelloFromAD`。

trans-unit.source: This method does not have to have the same functionality as the one in the example; it can simply display a string to the console.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不需要具有相同的功能与在这些示例。它只是可以向控制台显示字符串。

trans-unit.source: The assembly must also have an <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyVersionAttribute> attribute that sets its version to 1.0.0.0.
trans-unit.target: 程序集必须还具有<xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyVersionAttribute>将其版本设置为 1.0.0.0 的属性。

trans-unit.source: When you run the example, the assembly you compiled in the current directory is found before the dynamic directory is searched.
trans-unit.target: 运行示例时，当前目录中编译的程序集位于之前搜索的动态目录。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set because the application name on the application domain is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 无法设置此属性，因为应用程序域上的应用程序名称为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: for access to the path information.
trans-unit.target: 用于访问的路径信息。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />

trans-unit.source: Returns the XML configuration information set by the <see cref="M:System.AppDomainSetup.SetConfigurationBytes(System.Byte[])" /> method, which overrides the application's XML configuration information.
trans-unit.target: 返回由 <see cref="M:System.AppDomainSetup.SetConfigurationBytes(System.Byte[])" /> 方法设置的 XML 配置信息，这些信息优先于应用程序的 XML 配置信息。

trans-unit.source: An array that contains the XML configuration information that was set by the <see cref="M:System.AppDomainSetup.SetConfigurationBytes(System.Byte[])" /> method, or <see langword="null" /> if the <see cref="M:System.AppDomainSetup.SetConfigurationBytes(System.Byte[])" /> method has not been called.
trans-unit.target: 一个数组，其中包含由 <see cref="M:System.AppDomainSetup.SetConfigurationBytes(System.Byte[])" /> 方法设置的 XML 配置信息；如果未调用 <see cref="M:System.AppDomainSetup.SetConfigurationBytes(System.Byte[])" /> 方法，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.SetConfigurationBytes%2A> method provides a way to override the configuration information of an application that creates a new application domain.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.SetConfigurationBytes%2A>方法提供了如何重写创建新的应用程序域的应用程序的配置信息。

trans-unit.source: The configuration file information in `value` overrides the configuration file information for the application.
trans-unit.target: 中的配置文件信息`value`重写应用程序的配置文件信息。

trans-unit.source: For example, when the Example.exe application creates a new application domain, it can override the configuration information originally obtained from Example.exe.config file.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当 Example.exe 应用程序创建新的应用程序域时，它会重写最初从 Example.exe.config 文件中获取的配置信息。

trans-unit.source: Some consumers of configuration file information do not use the information stored by the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.SetConfigurationBytes%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 配置文件信息的一些使用者不使用存储的信息<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.SetConfigurationBytes%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The runtime does not enforce this.
trans-unit.target: 运行时不会强制此。

trans-unit.source: To ensure that all configuration file information is overridden in a new application domain, use the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ConfigurationFile%2A> property to specify a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保新的应用程序域中被重写所有配置文件信息，请使用<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ConfigurationFile%2A>属性来指定配置文件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.SetConfigurationBytes%2A> method does affect assembly binding.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.SetConfigurationBytes%2A>方法会影响程序集绑定。

trans-unit.source: The XML in `value` is the same as the XML in a normal configuration file, except that it is stored as a <xref:System.Byte> array.
trans-unit.target: 中的 XML`value`具有与在常规配置文件中，XML 相同，只不过它存储为<xref:System.Byte>数组。

trans-unit.source: To access the configuration bytes for an application domain, use the <xref:System.AppDomain.SetupInformation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to get the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup> object for the application domain, then use the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.GetConfigurationBytes%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问应用程序域的配置字节，使用<xref:System.AppDomain.SetupInformation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性来获取<xref:System.AppDomainSetup>对象对于应用程序域中，然后使用<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.GetConfigurationBytes%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location of the license file associated with this domain.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与此域关联的许可证文件的位置。

trans-unit.source: The location and name of the license file.
trans-unit.target: 许可证文件的位置和名称。

trans-unit.source: for access to the path information.
trans-unit.target: 用于访问的路径信息。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />

trans-unit.source: Specifies the optimization policy used to load an executable.
trans-unit.target: 指定用于加载可执行文件的优化策略。

trans-unit.source: An enumerated constant that is used with the <see cref="T:System.LoaderOptimizationAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 与 <see cref="T:System.LoaderOptimizationAttribute" /> 配合使用的枚举常数。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a dynamic assembly and saves it to disk, and then uses the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.LoaderOptimization%2A> property to set the optimization policy used to load the assembly into an application domain.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建动态程序集，并将其保存到磁盘，然后使用<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.LoaderOptimization%2A>属性来设置用于将程序集加载到应用程序域的优化策略。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a list of assemblies marked with the <see cref="F:System.Security.PartialTrustVisibilityLevel.NotVisibleByDefault" /> flag that are made visible to partial-trust code running in a sandboxed application domain.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置标以 <see cref="F:System.Security.PartialTrustVisibilityLevel.NotVisibleByDefault" /> 标志的程序集的列表，这些程序集对沙箱应用程序域中的部分信任代码可见。

trans-unit.source: An array of partial assembly names, where each partial name consists of the simple assembly name and the public key.
trans-unit.target: 部分程序集名称的数组，其中每个部分名称都由简单程序集名称和公钥组成。

trans-unit.source: Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the <xref:System.Security.AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute> (APTCA) attribute can be made conditional by setting its <xref:System.Security.AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute.PartialTrustVisibilityLevel%2A> property to <xref:System.Security.PartialTrustVisibilityLevel.NotVisibleByDefault>.
trans-unit.target: 开头[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]、 <xref:System.Security.AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute> (APTCA) 特性可以通过条件设置其<xref:System.Security.AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute.PartialTrustVisibilityLevel%2A>属性<xref:System.Security.PartialTrustVisibilityLevel.NotVisibleByDefault>。

trans-unit.source: An APTCA assembly that is marked with <xref:System.Security.PartialTrustVisibilityLevel.NotVisibleByDefault> cannot be used by partially trusted code unless the host application allows it.
trans-unit.target: 将标有 APTCA 程序集<xref:System.Security.PartialTrustVisibilityLevel.NotVisibleByDefault>流量，除非主机应用程序允许它不能由部分受信任的代码。

trans-unit.source: The host of a sandboxed application domain allows code in the application domain to use assemblies with conditional APTCA attributes by creating an array that contains the simple name and public key of each assembly, and assigning the array to this property.
trans-unit.target: 沙盒应用程序域的主机允许的应用程序域使用带有条件 APTCA 特性的程序集，通过创建一个数组，包含的简单名称和公钥的每个程序集，并将数组分配给此属性中的代码。

trans-unit.source: For example, an element of the array might look like the following: "MyAssembly, ".
trans-unit.target: 例如，数组的元素可能如下所示:"MyAssembly，PublicKey "。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a subclass of <xref:System.AppDomainManager>, and the assembly that defines it depends on assemblies that are marked with the conditional APTCA attribute, you must include those assemblies in the list that you pass to the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.PartialTrustVisibleAssemblies%2A> property of the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup> you use to create application domains.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用的一个子类<xref:System.AppDomainManager>，并定义它的程序集依赖于用条件 APTCA 特性标记的程序集，则必须将传递给列表中包括这些程序集<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.PartialTrustVisibleAssemblies%2A>属性<xref:System.AppDomainSetup>使用来创建应用程序域。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise the assemblies that are marked with the conditional APTCA attribute will be disabled.
trans-unit.target: 否则将禁用用条件 APTCA 特性标记的程序集。

trans-unit.source: When you are debugging an application that is running in a sandboxed application domain, some <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> messages can be misleading.
trans-unit.target: 当你正调试的应用程序在沙盒应用程序域中，运行某些<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>消息可能会产生误导。

trans-unit.source: For example, a message might state that one of your fully trusted assemblies has only limited permissions, when the real cause of the problem is that a security demand that exceeds the grant set of the sandboxed application domain has propagated to the boundary of the sandboxed application domain and failed.
trans-unit.target: 例如，一条消息可能状态，你完全受信任的程序集之一只具有有限权限，当问题的真正原因时超过沙盒应用程序域的授予集的安全要求已传播到的边界沙盒应用程序域和失败。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the list of directories under the application base directory that are probed for private assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置应用程序基目录下的目录列表，这些目录被探测以寻找其中的私有程序集。

trans-unit.source: A list of directory names separated by semicolons.
trans-unit.target: 目录名称的列表，用分号分隔。

trans-unit.source: Private assemblies are deployed in the same directory structure as the application.
trans-unit.target: 专用程序集部署在与应用程序相同的目录结构中。

trans-unit.source: If the directories specified for <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.PrivateBinPath%2A> are not under <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationBase%2A>, they are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果为指定目录<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.PrivateBinPath%2A>下不是<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationBase%2A>，它们将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string value that includes or excludes <see cref="P:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationBase" /> from the search path for the application, and searches only <see cref="P:System.AppDomainSetup.PrivateBinPath" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个字符串值，用于在应用程序的搜索路径中包含 <see cref="P:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationBase" />，或者从搜索路径中排除该基路径而只在 <see cref="P:System.AppDomainSetup.PrivateBinPath" /> 中进行搜索。

trans-unit.source: A null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) to include the application base path when searching for assemblies; any non-null string value to exclude the path.
trans-unit.target: 空引用（ Visual Basic 中的 <see langword="Nothing" />），包括搜索程序集时的应用程序基路径；要排除该路径的任何非空字符串值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to any non-null string value, including <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType> (""), to exclude the application directory path — that is, <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationBase%2A> — from the search path for the application, and to search for assemblies only in <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.PrivateBinPath%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 将此属性设置为任何非 null 字符串值，包括<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>("")，以排除应用程序目录路径-即， <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationBase%2A> -对于应用程序，并搜索程序集的搜索路径中仅在<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.PrivateBinPath%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether interface caching is disabled for interop calls in the application domain, so that a <c>QueryInterface</c> is performed on each call.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在应用程序域中为互操作调用禁用接口缓存，从而对每个调用执行 <c>QueryInterface</c>。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if interface caching is disabled for interop calls in application domains created with the current <see cref="T:System.AppDomainSetup" /> object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果为使用当前 <see cref="T:System.AppDomainSetup" /> 对象创建的应用程序域中的互操作调用禁用接口缓存，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Disabling interface caching has a significant impact on the performance of interop calls.
trans-unit.target: 对性能的互操作调用禁用接口缓存产生重大影响。

trans-unit.source: This member is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此成员在中引入[!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: An enumerable set of string values that specify compatibility switches, or <see langword="null" /> to erase the existing compatibility switches.
trans-unit.target: 指定兼容性开关的字符串值的可枚举集或要擦除现有兼容性开关的 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified switches, making the application domain compatible with previous versions of the .NET Framework for the specified issues.
trans-unit.target: 设置指定的开关，从而使应用程序域针对指定问题与早期版本的 .NET Framework 兼容。

trans-unit.source: Major versions of the .NET Framework sometimes introduce breaking changes from the previous version.
trans-unit.target: 主要版本的.NET Framework 有时会引入的先前版本中的重大更改。

trans-unit.source: For example, the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] introduces a small number of breaking changes from the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 例如，[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]引入了少量的重大更改从[!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.SetCompatibilitySwitches%2A> method to specify that one or more of these breaking changes should be rolled back for the application domain, to make the behavior compatible with the previous version of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.SetCompatibilitySwitches%2A>方法，以指定一个或多个这些重大更改应将其回滚应用程序域，以使此行为与以前版本的.NET framework 兼容。

trans-unit.source: Each time you call this method, it replaces the existing switch settings.
trans-unit.target: 每次调用此方法，它将替换现有的交换机设置。

trans-unit.source: To erase the settings, specify `null` for the `switches` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要清除设置，指定`null`为`switches`参数。

trans-unit.source: The set of string values you provide for `switches` can be a simple string array, because arrays implement the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 为提供的字符串值的一套`switches`可以是一个简单的字符串数组，因为数组实现<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>接口。

trans-unit.source: The following table provides examples of compatibility switches that can be set to restore the behavior of earlier versions of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 下表提供兼容性开关，可设置为还原的.NET Framework 的早期版本的行为的示例。

trans-unit.source: Switch
trans-unit.target: 开关

trans-unit.source: Meaning
trans-unit.target: 含义

trans-unit.source: "NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy"
trans-unit.target: "NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy"

trans-unit.source: Code access security (CAS) for the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] is enabled in this application domain.
trans-unit.target: 代码访问安全性 (CAS)[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]在此应用程序域中启用。

trans-unit.source: See [<NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element.md).
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[ <NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy>元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element.md)。

trans-unit.source: "NetFx40_Legacy20SortingBehavior"
trans-unit.target: "NetFx40_Legacy20SortingBehavior"

trans-unit.source: String sorting defaults for the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] are enabled in this application domain.
trans-unit.target: 字符串排序的默认值[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]在此应用程序域中启用。

trans-unit.source: Successfully restoring legacy sorting behavior also requires the sort00001000.dll dynamic link library to be available on the local system.
trans-unit.target: 已成功还原旧排序行为还要求 sort00001000.dll 动态链接库，可在本地系统上。

trans-unit.source: See [<CompatSortNLSVersion> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/compatsortnlsversion-element.md).
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[ <CompatSortNLSVersion>元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/compatsortnlsversion-element.md)。

trans-unit.source: "NetFx40_Legacy40SortingBehavior"
trans-unit.target: "NetFx40_Legacy40SortingBehavior"

trans-unit.source: String sorting defaults for the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] and Unicode 5.0 are enabled in this application domain.
trans-unit.target: 字符串排序的默认值[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]和在此应用程序域中启用 Unicode 5.0。

trans-unit.source: Successfully restoring legacy sorting behavior also requires the sort00060101.dll dynamic link library to be available on the local system.
trans-unit.target: 已成功还原旧排序行为还要求 sort00060101.dll 动态链接库，可在本地系统上。

trans-unit.source: "NetFx40_TimeSpanLegacyFormatMode"
trans-unit.target: "NetFx40_TimeSpanLegacyFormatMode"

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.TimeSpan> formatting behavior for the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] is enabled in this application domain.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeSpan> 格式设置行为[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]在此应用程序域中启用。

trans-unit.source: See [<TimeSpan_LegacyFormatMode> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/timespan-legacyformatmode-element.md) and the "Restoring Legacy TimeSpan Formatting" section of the <xref:System.TimeSpan> topic.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[ <TimeSpan_LegacyFormatMode>元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/timespan-legacyformatmode-element.md)和"还原旧时间跨度格式设置"部分的<xref:System.TimeSpan>主题。

trans-unit.source: "UseRandomizedStringHashAlgorithm"
trans-unit.target: "UseRandomizedStringHashAlgorithm"

trans-unit.source: The runtime calculates hash codes for strings on a per application domain basis instead of using a single hashing algorithm that produces a consistent hash code across application domains.
trans-unit.target: 运行时计算字符串的哈希代码上每个应用程序域而不是使用单一的哈希算法跨应用程序域中生成的一致的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: See [<UseRandomizedStringHashAlgorithm> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/userandomizedstringhashalgorithm-element.md).
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[ <UseRandomizedStringHashAlgorithm>元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/userandomizedstringhashalgorithm-element.md)。

trans-unit.source: An array that contains the XML configuration information to be used for the application domain.
trans-unit.target: 一个数组，其中包含要用于应用程序域的 XML 配置信息。

trans-unit.source: Provides XML configuration information for the application domain, replacing the application's XML configuration information.
trans-unit.target: 提供应用程序域的 XML 配置信息，并替换应用程序的 XML 配置信息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.SetConfigurationBytes%2A> method provides a way to replace the configuration information of an application that creates a new application domain.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.SetConfigurationBytes%2A>方法使您能够将创建新的应用程序域的应用程序的配置信息。

trans-unit.source: The configuration file information in `value` replaces the configuration file information for the application.
trans-unit.target: 中的配置文件信息`value`替换应用程序的配置文件信息。

trans-unit.source: For example, when the Example.exe application creates a new application domain, it can replace the configuration information originally obtained from the Example.exe.config file.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当 Example.exe 应用程序创建新的应用程序域时，它可以替换最初从 Example.exe.config 文件中获取的配置信息。

trans-unit.source: Some consumers of configuration file information do not use the information stored by the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.SetConfigurationBytes%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 配置文件信息的一些使用者不使用存储的信息<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.SetConfigurationBytes%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The runtime does not enforce this.
trans-unit.target: 运行时不会强制此。

trans-unit.source: To ensure that all configuration file information is replaced in a new application domain, use the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ConfigurationFile%2A> property to specify a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保所有的配置文件信息已替换为新的应用程序域中，使用<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ConfigurationFile%2A>属性来指定配置文件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.SetConfigurationBytes%2A> method does affect assembly binding.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.SetConfigurationBytes%2A>方法会影响程序集绑定。

trans-unit.source: The XML in `value` is the same as the XML in a normal configuration file, except that it is stored as a <xref:System.Byte> array.
trans-unit.target: 中的 XML`value`具有与在常规配置文件中，XML 相同，只不过它存储为<xref:System.Byte>数组。

trans-unit.source: The name of the string comparison function to override.
trans-unit.target: 要重载的字符串比较函数的名称。

trans-unit.source: The function version.
trans-unit.target: 函数版本。

trans-unit.source: For [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], its value must be 1 or greater.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，必须为 1 或者 更大的数值。

trans-unit.source: A pointer to the function that overrides <c>functionName</c>.
trans-unit.target: 重写 <c>functionName</c> 的函数的指针。

trans-unit.source: Provides the common language runtime with an alternate implementation of a string comparison function.
trans-unit.target: 向通用语言运行时提供备用字符串比较功能实现。

trans-unit.source: The following string comparison and sorting methods can be overridden by the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.SetNativeFunction%2A> method:
trans-unit.target: 下面的字符串比较和排序方法可重写<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.SetNativeFunction%2A>方法：

trans-unit.source: For information about these functions, see [National Language Support Functions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=228134).
trans-unit.target: 有关这些函数的信息，请参阅[国家/地区的语言支持功能](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=228134)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="functionName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="functionName" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="functionVersion" /> is not 1 or greater.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="functionVersion" /> 不是 1 或者更大的值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="functionPointer" /> is <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="functionPointer" /> 为 <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" />。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任直接调用方。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分受信任或不透明的代码。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the names of the directories containing assemblies to be shadow copied.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置目录的名称，这些目录包含要进行卷影复制的程序集。

trans-unit.source: A list of directory names separated by semicolons.
trans-unit.target: 目录名称的列表，用分号分隔。

trans-unit.source: When shadow copying is enabled, the default is to shadow copy all assemblies found through probing; that is, in the directories specified by the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.PrivateBinPath%2A> and <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationBase%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 启用卷影复制后，默认值是向通过探测; 找到的所有程序集的卷影副本即指定的目录的<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.PrivateBinPath%2A>和<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationBase%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ShadowCopyDirectories%2A> property restricts the shadow copy to the assemblies in the directories specified by <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ShadowCopyDirectories%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ShadowCopyDirectories%2A>属性将卷影副本限制到指定的目录中的程序集<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ShadowCopyDirectories%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If you don’t assign a string to the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ShadowCopyDirectories%2A> property, or if you set this property to `null`, all assemblies in the directories specified by the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationBase%2A> and <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.PrivateBinPath%2A> properties are shadow copied.
trans-unit.target: 如果未将字符串分配至 <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ShadowCopyDirectories%2A> 属性或者将此属性设置为 `null`，则 <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationBase%2A> 和 <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.PrivateBinPath%2A> 属性指定的目录中的所有程序集均进行卷影复制。

trans-unit.source: Directory paths must not contain semicolons, because the semicolon is the delimiter character.
trans-unit.target: 目录路径不能包含分号，因为分号是分隔符。

trans-unit.source: There is no escape character for semicolons.
trans-unit.target: 分号没有转义符。

trans-unit.source: When shadow copying is in effect, assembly files are copied to another location before the assemblies are loaded.
trans-unit.target: 卷影复制生效时，程序集文件复制到其他位置，这些程序集加载之前。

trans-unit.source: The original assembly file is not locked, so it can be updated.
trans-unit.target: 没有锁定原始程序集文件，因此它可以进行更新。

trans-unit.source: For more information on shadow copying, see [Shadow Copying Assemblies](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md).
trans-unit.target: 卷影复制的详细信息，请参阅[影像复制程序集](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md)。

trans-unit.source: for access to the path information.
trans-unit.target: 用于访问的路径信息。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that indicates whether shadow copying is turned on or off.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置指示卷影复制是打开还是关闭的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The string value "true" to indicate that shadow copying is turned on; or "false" to indicate that shadow copying is turned off.
trans-unit.target: 字符串值“true”指示打开了卷影复制；“false”则指示关闭了卷影复制。

trans-unit.source: For more information on shadow copying, see [Shadow Copying Assemblies](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md).
trans-unit.target: 卷影复制的详细信息，请参阅[影像复制程序集](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that specifies the target version and profile of the .NET Framework for the application domain, in a format that can be parsed by the <see cref="M:System.Runtime.Versioning.FrameworkName.#ctor(System.String)" /> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置为应用程序域指定目标版本和 .NET Framework 配置文件的字符串，以可由 <see cref="M:System.Runtime.Versioning.FrameworkName.#ctor(System.String)" /> 构造函数分析的格式。

trans-unit.source: The target version and profile of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 的目标版本和配置文件。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to tell the currently running version of the .NET Framework that the application domain will be used to load and run assemblies that have been compiled for the target version and profile.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性来告诉当前正在运行.NET Framework 版本，将使用的应用程序域加载并运行目标版本和配置文件已编译的程序集。

trans-unit.source: If the currently running version of the .NET Framework has optional behaviors that affect the compatibility of code that was compiled with the target version, it can enable or disable those behaviors, as appropriate, to improve compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前正在运行.NET Framework 版本有影响的兼容性用目标版本编译的代码的可选行为，它可以启用或禁用这些行为，根据需要，为了提高兼容性。

trans-unit.source: This can be useful when an application supports add-ins compiled with multiple versions of the .NET Framework by running them in separate application domains.
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序支持在单独的应用程序域中运行它们编译使用.NET framework 的多个版本的外接程序时，这很有用。

trans-unit.source: For client applications, the value of the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.TargetFrameworkName%2A> property is inferred from the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.TargetFrameworkAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 对于客户端应用程序，值<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.TargetFrameworkName%2A>属性，则从推断<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.TargetFrameworkAttribute>属性。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)] and later, this attribute is added to the assembly automatically based on the setting of the project's **Target Framework** property.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)]和更高版本，此属性添加到程序集将根据项目的设置自动**目标框架**属性。
